text: yār mēlāṉavar? Payapaktiyuṭaṉ allāhviṉ tirupporuttattai nāṭi oru kaṭṭaṭattiṉ aṭippaṭaiyai amaittavarā? Allatu (tāṉē carintuviṭakkūṭiya) pūmiyai oṭṭi aṭippaṭaiyiṭṭu (anta aṭippaṭaiyil) kaṭṭaṭattai - atuvum carintu poṭippoṭiyāka noṟuṅki avaruṭaṉ naraka neruppil viḻuntu viṭum (kaṭṭaṭattai amaittavarā?) Allāh aniyāyakkāra makkaḷai nēr vaḻiyil naṭatta māṭṭāṉ
